skillTree.localised_description: The finest horses in the Old World, bred for their endurance and fiery temperament, barded for further protection.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

skillTree.localised_description: Stronger and faster than the mightiest warhorse, these intelligent beasts are exceptionally loyal to their noble masters.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

ui_effects.localised_text: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

skillTree.localised_description: From the verdant depths, the Lady rises to protect the faithful.
The Lady's blessing is a wondrous gift freely graced upon all Bretonnian subjects, should they but kneel and utter their devotion.

effects.description: Passive ability: "The Blessing of the Lady"

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: They march because they're told to, and of course because they'll get a 'right proper thrashin'' if they don't.
While the Knights of Origo aren't crusading, they spend their days praying and meditating, at least until another incursion from the south arrives.
Donna Don Domingio is the right hand of Grand Master Tyreweld and the champion of the Knights of Origo, a truly valued member of the righteous brotherhood.

effects.description:
Attribute: Causes Fear for all Knight units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Worry is a waste of energy, it can't change the past, it can't control the future, it only makes today miserable, so go out there and kill those heathens!
Sickness must be purged, and purged it shall be!

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +5% for Battle Pilgrim and Grail Reliquae units
	(Hero's army)

Ward save: 5% for Battle Pilgrim and Grail Reliquae units
	(Hero's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Battle Pilgrim and Grail Reliquae units
	(Hero's army)

Ward save: 10% for Battle Pilgrim and Grail Reliquae units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Far more than allegiance or loyalty, true dedication to Lady and kingdom further empowers her Knights on the field.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +10% for Battle Pilgrim and Grail Reliquae units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Knights have crusaded extensively against the enemies of all right thinking folk and as such have gained a considerable reputation from their enemies.

effects.description: Melee attack: +8 when fighting against Tomb Kings, Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Arabyan factions

skillTree.localised_description: "The Lady calls me hence. I must answer her…"

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Tomb Kings, Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Arabyan factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Tomb Kings, Vampire Counts, Vampire Coast and Arabyan factions

skillTree.localised_description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.
In the midst of a bloodbath it's good to know that someone has your back.

effects.description:
Hero action cost: -10%

Enemy Hero action success chance: -5%

	(enemy characters in region)

items.colour_text: Passed down from Champion to Champion, this sword is fit for a devout and honourable Knight of olden times, ready to dispatch the Heathens.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +30% chance of wounding aggressors
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Tomb Kings, Chaos, Beastmen, Greenskins, Skaven and Vampire Counts

backgroundSkills.localised_description: This Knight has great contempt for those who eschew the martial values of meeting one's opponent face to face.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero
